item.title: About me
item.description: My name is Tomas Fernandez, I live in Argentina. I work mostly as a DBA and I love it. I also love programming languages in general. After getting my a degree on Electronic Engineering, 15 years ago, I've been working in the IT sector. During this time I wore various hats, working on a network operation centers on a big Telcos, as an developer, as sysadmin and lastly as a DBA.
